# langsmith_service_account (Resource)

Manages a LangSmith service account. Service accounts cannot be updated; changing any mutable attribute will force recreation.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "langsmith_service_account" "example" {
  name = "ci-pipeline"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the service account.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp of the service account.
- `default_workspace_id` (String) The default workspace ID of the service account.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the service account.
- `organization_id` (String) The organization ID of the service account.
- `updated_at` (String) The last update timestamp of the service account.
